column5: Plan, implement and evaluate digital business initiatives in all areas of an organisation.Digital technologies have changed the way organisations conduct business. They afford new ways of working including fresh opportunities.They also present new challenges for digital businesses. Our Digital Business MSc prepares you for this ever-changing complex and digital landscape.In a world where decision-making is ambiguous, this course will challenge you. You'll need to think in new and varied ways for a turbulent and fast-moving digital age.There is great demand for digital business professionals. This Master’s supports various career paths to further your career interests.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
